effect.sword_shield: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.legends_arceus: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.sword_shield: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
